website_summaries.verdict: Although a considerable number, the positive feedback that surrounds the Reebok Runner 2.0 MT were mostly about the comfort and fit, and not much was said regarding its performance. Meanwhile, it is worth noting that the criticisms of the shoe were about structure and durability. In summary, the shoe might be a reliable option for light running, but runners should not expect much when it comes to extreme activities.
pros: Several buyers commented that the Reebok Runner 2.0 MT was a shoe that is worth the price
The cushioning was excellent, especially in the heel area, a couple of wearers stated
Many buyers agreed that it was a comfortable shoe
Every step was refreshing because of the memory foam in the sock liner, a customer said
The shoe provided sufficient heel support, no matter how active the foot was, a reviewer shared
cons: One runner felt that the midsole’s shock-absorbing capability was not sufficient
The shoe was too flexible and lacked stability, according to a wearer
A customer said the toe box was short
The shoe showed signs of wear early, mentioned a disappointed user
There was not enough arch support from the midsole, a buyer complained

customer_reviews.title: Half price, brand new, and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable sneakers I've bought in a LONG WHILE! I bought these for my new job where I'm walking around and standing all day. After coming home the first two days, my feet were on fire! These shoes instantly solved that problem. And there's almost half price on here as opposed to how much I saw in Sears and in the Reebok Outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Deja Louco

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered shoes from Amazon Warehouse before and most of them look like somebody tried them on, they didn't fit, and they boxed them up and returned them. This pair looked like someone had worn them for a week or so. The bottoms and sides of the soles were dirty enough that I had to clean them before I wore them. They're comfortable because somebody broke them in for me.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mays

customer_reviews.title: great, reasonably priced running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my Nikes were killing me (too tight, though technically the right size) and I won't ever buy Nike again after the Kaepernick thing. These were well - rated and they deserve the positive reviews. Fit perfectly, feel great, great for running in. Seem to hold up really well. Also look good, as much as can be the case with running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. ZHI

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for step and other exercise classes and they are very light but supportive. They are classified as running shoes but I think few runners would use these when they are many more styles out there that are even lighter. It has been years since I bought a Reebok shoe but they always seem to have good products.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mecca

customer_reviews.title: Fat feet make tongue look like pack of hot dogs if too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Little too tight. Though I have fat feet. Tongue at top of foot looked like a package of hot dogs. But again I have fat feet. I took laces out of the middle tongue holder and it looks much better. I will where these shoes. I am happy. Just being real!
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Heal wore out at about 7 months
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe just above my heal wore out and broke loose at about 7 months. Had to take an exacto knife and cut the plastic out of the shoe because it began to wear the back of my foot. The shoe did last about 7 months, but I was hoping for more.
customer_reviews.author: Raymie

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes, it is unfortunate that they didn't fit as expected and I had to return them. The color was amazing; they really popped and I hoped I could have kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very cushiony I bought these to do running and workout in. They are fantastic for that. So comfortable I took them on a walking vacation to Washington DC and New York city where we walked an average of 10 miles plus a day. With my other walking shoes my feet hurt. With these my feet did not hurt at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the shoe but I did not realize the top is just a mesh material so in cold weather it does very little to keep your feet warm. A good running shoe but don't expect it to keep your feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes right of the box that i have worn in a while
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good traction, light weight, memory foam insole feels great. Definatately will buy again. Shoe size accurate
customer_reviews.author: Barry S.

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe. Very comfortable. Runners look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Perfect for what I needed which is a summer walking shoe. I don’t think I would run in these shoes as they don’t have enough stability. These were made for comfort not performance.
customer_reviews.author: x_swinson_x

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Wear them just about everywhere and there pretty comfortable. Only reason it's four stars is because the tread has started too peel off of the heel end on one of my shoes
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son. He chose them for the color and style, but he says these are the most comfortable shoes he has ever had. We will buy Reebok again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: After almost one year of use every day, recently shoe look deteriorate. These shoes are a good product and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: JohnBetaCode

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers and awesome color combo. They are so comfortable and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soft light and comfortable shoes took them to my fiances country colombia and ...
customer_reviews.text: soft light and comfortable shoes took them to my fiances country colombia and it is hot and humid and they were perfect very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.author: John Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Men's Runner 2.0 MT Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, they fit well and are very comfortable. Time will tell how durable they are but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: G. Everett

customer_reviews.title: look great
customer_reviews.text: shoes look great. they are lacking in arch support. i wouldnt want to run in them much.
customer_reviews.author: dos jeeps

customer_reviews.title: First impression is they fit nice and are super light
customer_reviews.text: First impression is they fit nice and are super light. Road heat still gets through but without a gel layer I expected that. Bought these for suburban paved paths and expect them to last a few seasons at least.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Its so soft and amazingly comfortable whenever I walk faster.The colour is too catchy and liked by my friends as well. The best thing is that it fits properly if its US Size 8 and you can go for it blindly. Its kind of tight at the heels and of course the cushion down there undermine these things. Over all a very satisfied purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kishore Bharathkumar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. First pair of Reebok in a long time. Great fit, great feel and great look
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: Wear out fast!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit Great, felt Great, and looked great. But sadly they do NOT last. The in soles wore out very very fast on the heel and front of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoes, fit well and are comfortable. good for cross training or just being on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Roy M.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping time and  great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Order took a long time to get!!! The shoes were GREAT !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel great not heavy but not too light
customer_reviews.text: Feel great not heavy but not too light.Sole is very soft so I added an insole for a little more protection .
customer_reviews.author: jameezy

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light weight. I use them as shoes for nursing so I am up a lot on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: nbaker77

customer_reviews.title: Cool,comfortable, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Cool for hot weather. Soft feel....may need to add more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Previously had poor experience with Reeboks in the past
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of Reeboks started falling apart before I even got to run in them. These have been the total opposite. Incredibly comfortable without looking hideous. Wouldn’t hesitate to buy another pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Will Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look attractive and are well built, but were too small and hurt my feet and ankles.
customer_reviews.author: janis irving

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well!
customer_reviews.text: My childs feet are long and skinny but these shoes do well for him
customer_reviews.author: Karen Howard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes. I normally wear a 10 and fit was dead on.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and they look good. They take a good pounding.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but not for running
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are really good looking but they are fot running, material isn't good quality and not soft. In addition runs big. 10.5 is like 11.5 !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like Reebok men's running shoes I wear them at work
customer_reviews.author: Leonard B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes, but a little bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes,but a little bit narrow. I can wear them without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers for gym
customer_reviews.text: Cool and comfortable, second pair I have purchased. Use them for lifting in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Reci

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the comfort and price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe!! Super comfortable at a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ledingham

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT CAME AS DESCRIBED AND MY SON LOVES IT
customer_reviews.author: snehal shah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 13 and these did not fit at all but said they were 13.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves these sneakers and says they are super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: stacie roberts

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is very light and the color is great.
customer_reviews.text: Size is a little on the small side but not tight at all. Shoe is very light and the color is great.
customer_reviews.author: YRod

customer_reviews.title: usually i wear 10 so i did order size 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: usually i wear 10 so i did order size 10 but they are bit to large but other than that they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Darek

customer_reviews.title: a little bit small
customer_reviews.text: i ordered size 10 but it seems to be small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for walking and nothing else!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cushion these sneakers have makes them confortable to walk but they don't give the stability to the feet to exercise.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: 2 different shoe colors, 2 different sizes
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived slightly crushed with a rubberband around the shoe box, which wasn't a big deal. But then I opened the box and the 2 shows were obviously different colors from each other and one was a size 9 and the other a size 10. Pretty ridiculous. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: Fits way wider than all the other Reebok shoes I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits way wider than all the other Reebok shoes I've purchased of the same size and width. Because running shoes have a break in period of about 2 runs for me I didn't find out that they were too wide until it was too late to return
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Love the memory foam on the inside. After all day use it does flatten out but in the morning it has filled back up again. Got these on a great deal $40.
customer_reviews.author: O. Luna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the shoe. I felt it’s not worth it
customer_reviews.author: shobhan pujari

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Runner 2.0 Mt Sneaker
product_meta.description: It’s simple: you run. The Reebok runner 2.0 is designed to answer the call of your purist cause. Cushioned with a responsive foam that contours to your foot, you’ll feel the rebounding resilience of each stabilized stride, mile after mile.
